Operation 'upsellAirOffers' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. The operation lacks a description entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to understand its purpose and usage. The summary, while present, is somewhat passive ('Return a list') rather than action-oriented. The improved description clarifies: (1) the operation's purpose (generating upsell recommendations), (2) input expectations (array of flight offers), (3) output details (enhanced offers with premium options and services), (4) business context (branded fares, ancillary revenue), and (5) side effects (none - stateless computation). This enables AI agents to determine when this operation is appropriate for upselling scenarios.

data.current_summary: Return a list of upsell Flight Offers based on given Flight Offers
data.description_suggestion: Generates branded fare upsell recommendations based on provided flight offers. Accepts an array of flight offers as input and returns enhanced flight offers with premium cabin options, additional services, and branded fare products. This operation helps identify higher-value alternatives and ancillary revenue opportunities for the given itineraries. No state changes occur; results are computed based on input offers only.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a description entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to understand its purpose and usage. Operation 'upsellAirOffers' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. The current summary is vague about the upselling purpose and branded fares context. The description is completely missing, leaving AI agents unable to understand: (1) what 'upsell' means in this domain context (premium alternatives/branded fares), (2) what inputs are expected (array of flight offers), (3) what outputs are returned (enhanced offerings with services/pricing), (4) the operation's side effects (none - read-only), and (5) when to use this operation. The improved version clarifies the branded fares domain context, explains the input/output structure, and indicates this is a recommendation service without state changes, enabling better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Return a list of upsell Flight Offers based on given Flight Offers
data.summary_suggestion: Generate premium flight offer alternatives for upselling
data.description_suggestion: Generates a list of premium flight offer alternatives (branded fares) based on provided flight offers. Accepts an array of flight offers as input and returns enhanced offerings with additional services, amenities, and pricing tiers. This operation enables airlines to present higher-value alternatives to customers, including premium cabin classes, baggage allowances, and branded fare products. No state changes occur; this is a read-only recommendation service.
data.reasoning: The current summary is vague about the upselling purpose and branded fares context. The description is completely missing, leaving AI agents unable to understand: (1) what 'upsell' means in this domain context (premium alternatives/branded fares), (2) what inputs are expected (array of flight offers), (3) what outputs are returned (enhanced offerings with services/pricing), (4) the operation's side effects (none - read-only), and (5) when to use this operation. The improved version clarifies the branded fares domain context, explains the input/output structure, and indicates this is a recommendation service without state changes, enabling better AI agent decision-making.
